attributes.comment:
please do not allow the proposed fee increase to go into effect. My husband and I
have recently adopted to special needs boys from South Korea last year. We had
waited over 13 years to add childern to our family due to financial reasons. The
fees for adoption are so extremely high already and are what kept us from our
dream for so long. With the fee increase adoption would be out of the question for
us in the future. We are just your average everyday citizen and do not have a
wealth of money and these increased fees are a major hardship for us.

In adoption we MUST have the documents that the fee hike is proposed for and
there is no other way for us to obtain these important steps to bring our childern
home therefor we are at the mercy of our government and are begging you to
reconsider how to cover your cost.

Anita McCrackin
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anita McCrackin
